title: Portfolio
description: A collection of my personal projects, showing the latest first.

projects.label: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio where you can learn more about me, my projects and skills.

projects.label: CS Playground
description: This repository is where I keep track of my progress solving Leetcode style problems, examples and notes of problem-solving patterns and algorithms I have learned along the way.

projects.label: Vanilla Playground
description: In this repository is where I experiment with vanilla components to test out ideas and expand my expertise in CSS, HTML and JavaScript.

projects.label: GDental
description: GDental is a CRM built for a dental clinic, comes with a landing page where customers can find information about the clinic and a private section where employees can manage appointments.

projects.label: CStudent
description: CStudent tries to help students procrastinate less and keep track of their progress on different Udemy courses.
Implements the Udemy API so you can search and add courses.

projects.label: Firefighters : The Game
description: A vanilla game where your objective is trying to save as many people as possible trapped in a burning building.
Try to beat your score as difficulty increases!
